data.title: Barrier Start Round A Main Delivery
data.description: Delay Attackers towards A and set up an aggressive play towards Main with this Special Delivery lineup.

data.title: Early B Round Stealth Drone For Info
data.description: Gain a better understanding of the Attackers setup with this simple Stealth Drone. This allows you to understand what Sentinel utility they have set up.

data.title: Start C Mound Delivery Fight
data.description: At the start of the round, use this Special Delivery lineup to prevent Attackers from taking control of C quickly.

data.title: C Mound Armageddon Fight
data.description: Here's an easy, yet effective way to force an advantageous fight towards C. You can use this with more certainty if Attackers are looking to capture the ultimate orb.
